## KumoStoreState type

Type of [KumoStore](./lib-base.kumostore.md)<!-- -->'s [state](./lib-base.kumostore.state.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type KumoStoreState<T = unknown> = KumoStoreBaseState & T;
```
**References:** [KumoStoreBaseState](./lib-base.kumostorebasestate.md)

## Remarks

It combines all properties of [KumoStoreBaseState](./lib-base.kumostorebasestate.md) and [KumoStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.kumostorederivedstate.md) with optional extra state added by the particular `KumoStore` implementation.

The type parameter `T` may be used to type the extra state.
